segments.text: That was a very interesting presentation , Ms . Wang . My colleagues and I are very impressed with your proposal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no , surely . Your ideas were very interesting as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To show our appreciation for your hard work , we'd like to invite you to have dinner with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that would be lovely . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent . Have you had French food before ?
segments.speaker: S1
